songs.title: Yellow Hearts

description.plain:
Setting off with a slow-tempo romantic welcome, “Yellow Hearts” is a indie-music anthem that showcases a romantic relationship between two lovebirds and how “yellow hearts” represent the social media love coming from one of the lovers, through messages.

On Genius Q&A (Question & Answer), Ant Saunders, himself, put down the main inspiration of the song in a small summary:

So this song was mainly inspired by this point in time where I was talking to this girl and she was interested at first and then after a while I just kept questioning if she still was or not. And it just had me so stressed out and freaking miserable. So the yellow hearts thing, there’s this one thing she would do where when we would Snapchat, whenever I would compliment her, she would send me like a bunch of yellow hearts.

The song surprisingly blew up on social media app, TikTok with the audio being used in multiple-short clips. As well as mini-song duets, which covered the song.

It is also known for Ant Saunders to produce and write the song himself. Asides from the song, this is the second track on his successful album, BUBBLE.

songs.embed_content: Read “Yellow Hearts” by Ant Saunders on Genius

So this song was mainly inspired by this point in time where I was talking to this girl and she was interested at first and then after a while I just kept questioning if she still was or not. So the yellow hearts thing, there’s this one thing she would do where when we would Snapchat, whenever I would compliment her, she would send me like a bunch of yellow hearts.

The song surprisingly blew up on social media app, TikTok with the audio being used in multiple-short clips. As well as mini-song duets, which covered the song.

songs.full_title: Yellow Hearts (Remix) by Ant Saunders (Ft. Audrey Mika)
songs.title: Yellow Hearts (Remix)

songs.lyrics:
49 ContributorsYellow Hearts Lyrics[Chorus]
She put my name with yellow hearts
Her favorite color, like the stars
I didn't listen very hard
When she told me she was crazy from the start
She put my name with yellow hearts (Yeah, she did)
I said she was a work of art (Work of art)
I didn't listen very hard (Very hard, no, no)
When she told me she was crazy from the start

[Verse 1]
I drive down open roads so slow
Here comes a train, I'll let it go
Ain't got nobody on my phone
Don't like being all alone (Don't like being all alone)
Not good at keeping with the trends (No, no)
Too good at welcoming amends
It's been a while since I've heard her say
That we were more than friends (Oh)
Oh, I, I-I-I, know a lot is going on
But girl, please tell me
And I'll let you be
Are you still with me or not?
[Chorus]
She put my name with yellow hearts
Her favorite color, like the stars
I didn't listen very hard
When she told me she was crazy from the start
She put my name with yellow hearts (Yeah, she did)
I said she was a work of art (Work of art)
I didn't listen very hard (Very hard, no, no)
When she told me she was crazy from the start

[Refrain]
She put yellow hearts around my name
I thought they were all just the same
To you, what do they really mean?
Have you only been playing games?

[Verse 2]
I'm by the garden with the carpenter bees
Like I'm Bob Ross-in' with a Harden beard
Taking it all in like I got no issues in my nature
Primroses blooming in the night
Birds wanna take me on a flight
Appreciating my land 'fore it turns into a glacier
Chasers are of no good use
This taste will be long endured
Why'd you have to go so soon?
I thought this was as good as new
You might also like[Interlude]
She put yellow hearts around my name
I thought they were all just the same
To you, what do they really mean?
Have you only been playing games?

[Chorus]
She put my name with yellow hearts (Yeah, she did)
Her favorite color, like the stars (Like the stars)
I didn't listen very hard (Very hard, no, no)
When she told me she was crazy from the start
She put my name with yellow hearts (She put yellow hearts around my name)
I said she was a work of art (I thought they were all just the same)
I didn't listen very hard (To you, what do they really mean?)
When she told me she was crazy from the start (Have you only been playing games?)

[Outro]
Have you only been playing games?
No, no11Embed

songs.full_title: Yellow Hearts (Remix) by Ant Saunders (Ft. Audrey Mika)
songs.title: Yellow Hearts (Remix)

description.plain:
This remix was first inspired by the TikTok trend, where additional lyrics would be added after each line of the chorus of Sauder’s song, Yellow Hearts. Mika had created a new version of the lyrics and melodies and the video had received much appreciation and support on TikTok, inspiring the two artists to come together and make the remix.

The song was promoted via Mika and Sauder’s instagram stories.

I've been lying, yellow hearts aren't just friends

annotatable.link_title: Dial Tone by Ant Saunders (Ft. Kiaura Rose)
annotatable.title: Dial Tone

songs.lyrics:
1 ContributorDial Tone Lyrics[Intro]
"If you're there please pick up the phone, I really wanna talk to you
The fact that you're not answering leads me to believe you're either A: not at home, B: home, but don't want to talk to me, or C—"

[Chorus: Kiaura Rose]
Gotta call you back now
Left on read, I don't know what's about to go down
Leave a message at the tone 'cause you're still loud
I'll pretend that we're fine and just chill out
I gotta call you back now
Left on read, I don't know what's about to go down
Leave a message at the tone 'cause you're still loud
I'll pretend that we're fine, so I call you back a second time
[Verse 1: Ant Saunders]
I've been up all night, shakin' up a storm
If it keeps on goin', it might take a different form
Where do I turn?
I didn't expect this
But do I feel so disrespected?
Want to go to sleep, but, I'm terrified
Got all these feelings I just wanna keep it high
No, I'm so dark
I stay under these covers
Now that I see your true colors
When you find someone that's so enjoyable, I know that
When you get a chance, it's unavoidable, I know that
Uncovering our flaws
Questioning my trust
Leaving my heart in the dust

[Bridge: Kiaura Rose]
So what if I said, I'm a fool for you?
But I didn't wanna waste your time
So what if I said, that I'm on to you?
I knew you were lying the entire time

[Chorus: Kiaura Rose]
Gotta call you back now
Left on read, I don't know what's about to go down
Leave a message at the tone 'cause you're still loud
I'll pretend that we're fine and just chill out
I gotta call you back now
Left on read, I don't know what's about to go down
Leave a message at the tone 'cause you're still loud
I'll pretend that we're fine, so I call you back a second time
You might also like[Bridge: Ant Saunders]
So what if I said, I'm a fool for you?
And I can't get you out my mind
What if I said, I gave my all to you?
Let's just say, it's how we were, designed

[Verse 2: Kiaura Rose, Ant Saunders & Kiaura Rose]
You only lose your mind at night
I saw it with that look in your eyes
'Cause every time you turn off the lights you forget who you are, you forgot you were mine
So why'd you have to go back to her?
I thought that I would always come first
'Cause I just wanna look at the person I walked into his mess with before I—
Wonder if you're even certain who you are and what you're searching for, I wish I had a clue
What you really want to do?
I'm guessing now, I guess we're over
I resent you, we can't start over
Maybe I should just leave you alone
But I go back to the dial tone
Back to the dial tone
Back to the dial tone
Back to the dial tone

[Outro]
"We're sorry; you have reached a number that has been disconnected or is no longer in service. If you feel you have reached this recording in error, please check the number and try your call again."
*busy signal tone*1Embed
